> Perceptor : 
>
> PErceptor cursed and tried to take off the probe off Rodimus 

Perceptor realizes it would take him probrably less then 10 seconds to remove the probe ( OOC: it's not that complex, but it does require someone like Perceptor, who has medical or engieneering skills) and judging from the flash patturn of probe it would be just enough time. 

However at the same time the computer that the intruder had programmed is cycling again, and sends another command to raise the base and open the door. 

So the question becomes: which problem will Perceptor focus on, lowering the base or freeing Dark Rodimus?

**********************************************************************

Meanwhile, in the shuttle bay, standing against a wall, cloaked in shadow and stealth, the intruder watched the doors as the base rumbled with movement, waiting for the doors to open. 

Preston
(Da'minion)
